Title: Extensively accumulate funds in society to serve the construction of our nation's economy
Publisher: Shanxi Branch of the People's Bank of China (中国人民银行山西省分行)
Notes: This poster, published by the Shanxi Branch of the People's Bank of China, urges Agriculture and Industry to mutually contribute to the economy. On top, carts with agricultural products speed to the city, while industrial goods (tractors, etc.) move to the countryside. The theme is further amplified in the small vignettes.
